channel.title: Solution on Suprema AI
channel.description: Recent content in Solution on Suprema AI

item.title: Biometric Solution
item.description: Learn about Suprema AI’s biometric solution. QFace Core QFace Core is Suprema AI’s artificial intelligence face recognition algorithm solution. What is a face recognition algorithm? By combining the face detection part that finds a face in the image input through a given device, the facial feature detection that extracts unique features from the detected face, and the face matching part that compares these features with the previously registered features to determine whether they are the same person.

item.title: Vision AI Solution
item.description: Learn about Suprema AI’s vision AI solution. QVision Core QVision Core is Suprema AI’s vision AI algorithm solution. What is Vision AI? Content in preparation
